content: @dyn:vp=content.objectForKey:isVip; check(vp == 1, return nil); cp=content.objectForKey:cpContent; check(cp, return cp); return content.objectForKey:body

chapterDetail.url: @dyn:u=chapter.url; check(!u, return nil); bu=JxdSecuritySub.Utf8Encoded:u; idx=JxdRandom.RandomWithMin:1 max:100; format('http://chapter%@.zhuishushenqi.com/chapter/%@',idx, bu);

sourceDetail.url: @dyn:d=source.helpId; check(!d, return nil);nType=source.type;check(nType==1000, return format('http://api.zhuishushenqi.com/mix-toc/%@', d)); check(nType==1001, return format('http://api.zhuishushenqi.com/toc/%@?view=chapters', d));return nil

statusText: @dyn:c=ContentFormat.ToSingleText:content;check(c==1, return 连载); return 完本
